name: Toy Factory Tycoon
description:
Ho ho ho, kids! It's always Christmas in the North Pole!
Hence, there's no time to quit making fun-packed toy for good (or even bad) kids everywhere in the world!

Take a peek on Santa's Factory on one of the busiest season of the year, as the elves are up and about to pack toy for Santa Claus!

Help the Santa's Helpers to tidy up their work stations by merging the same type of toys. Tidier work station for the elves, and new toys for you! It's a win-win solution for everyone!
Watch (and merge) as your factory grow with more and more unique toy!

You don't just get paid with smiles, you can get in-game money, also! What else Santa's gonna buy food for his elves with??

So hop on before the sleigh leaves, and be part of kids' happiness and joy through toys!

Want to talk to us? We're here for you all the time via info@alegrium.com. Ho ho ho!
